findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or users from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can change buyback and ong addresses
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify buyback and ong addresses, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can remove and restore fees
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to remove and restore fees which could lead to potential security issues.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change _numTokensSellToAddToLiquidity value
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the _numTokensSellToAddToLiquidity value, which could lead to potential security issues.

findings.title: Owner can manually swap
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to manually swap tokens, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can enable/disable swap and liquify
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable swap and liquify functionality.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw contract tokens and BNBs
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the privilege to withdraw contract tokens and BNBs.
